posts.title: How a Class 12 Student Can Learn Software Development with Free Tools
posts.excerpt: A complete guide for high school students to learn software development using only free tools like Termux, GitHub, Django, React, and cloud platforms. Includes a real learning path, common mistakes, and practical tips.

seo.metaTitle: How a Class 12 Student Can Learn Software Development with Free Tools | ABSTER
seo.metaDescription: A complete guide for high school students to learn software development using free tools like Termux, GitHub, Django, React, and cloud platforms.

posts.title: Web Security Basics Explained: Headers, Cookies, CORS, HTTPS & Safety Scores
posts.excerpt: A beginner-friendly guide to web security covering security headers, cookies, CORS, HTTPS, Open Graph misuse, and basic safety scoring with simple JavaScript examples.

seo.metaTitle: Web Security Basics for Beginners | Headers, Cookies, CORS & HTTPS
seo.metaDescription: Learn web security from scratch. Understand security headers, cookies, CORS, HTTPS, Open Graph misuse, and basic safety scoring with beginner-friendly explanations.
